# serval Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "serval" {
  client_id = "My Client ID"
  client_secret = "My Client Secret"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `base_url` (String) Set the base url that the provider connects to.
- `client_id` (String)
- `client_secret` (String)
